attributes.action: terminate all political relationships and to ban travel in the U.K. to and from Pakistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government of Pakistan have handed over the control of the Swat valley to the Pakistani Taliban.  The Pakistani government are now complicit with the Taliban as, if they are not fighting the Taliban, they are effectively part of the Taliban.  All diplomatic relations should be immediately ceased with Pakistan, as should all travel to and from Pakistan from the U.K.  This ban should be in force until the Swat valley reflects true one-person-one-vote democracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
